original_text: But the brothers said to him, ‘Sir, why do you say these things? We are your servants. We would not do anything like that!
korean_text: 그들이 그에게 대답하되 내 주여 어찌 이렇게 말씀하시나이까 당신의 종들이 이런 일은 결단코 아니하나이다

sentences.original_text: But the brothers said to him
Sir, why do you say these things?
We would not do anything like that!
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그런 일을 결코 하지 않을 것입니다!
